skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 20% chance of filling this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10%. The second hit has a 20% chance of decreasing the target’s Tum Meter by 10%.
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit places a [Shield] equal to 25% of the damage inflicted on all allies for 2 turns. The second hit heals all allies by 10% of the damage inflicted.

Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns and a 75% chance of removing any [Increase ATK] buffs from the target. The second hit has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns and a 75% chance of removing any [Increase DEF] buffs from the target.
